title: conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Sex Offenders (Amendment) Act 2023
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Sex Offenders (Amendment) Act 2023
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Sex Offenders (Amendment) Act 2023 

(Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited sex offender (amendment) act 2023 (commencement) order 2023

title: conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Sex Offenders (Amendment) Act 2023
heading: 2. The 13th day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 13th day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Sex Offenders (Amendment) Act 2023 (No. 9 of 
2023) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

sections 1 to 13; 

(b) 

section 14(c); 

(c) 

sections 17 to 23; 

(d) 

sections 26 to 29; 

(e) 

section 30 (other than subsection (2)). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 November, 2023. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 14th November, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [539] 3
